theme.title: Choose Your Theme
theme.subtitle: Select a visual theme that suits your style and preferences

descriptions.classic: Clean and professional interface with neutral colors
descriptions.dark: Dark theme that's easier on the eyes in low light
descriptions.adventure: Nature-inspired theme perfect for outdoor adventures
descriptions.lego: Bright and playful theme inspired by LEGO blocks

age.title: What's Your Age?
age.subtitle: This helps us customize the interface just for you

robot.title: Select Your Robot
robot.subtitle: Choose a robot from your saved list or add a new one. Make sure your robot is powered on and connected to the network.
robot.connectionFailed: Connection failed. Please check your robot's network settings.
robot.connectionFailedDetails: Connection failed. Please check the IP address, port, and network connectivity.
robot.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this robot?
robot.connectConfirm: Are you sure you want to connect to {{name}}?

mode.title: Choose Robot Mode
mode.subtitle: Select the mode for your robot. This will determine the available blocks and default behaviours.

descriptions.exploration: Move the robot through an arena and scan floor tiles to find white tiles in a fully black environment.
descriptions.navigation: Navigate the robot through a labyrinth and find the optimal path to reach destinations.

programming.title: Visual Programming
programming.subtitle: Drag and drop blocks to program your robot

alerts.robotConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to Robot {{robotId}}. Please check the robot and network.

themeSelection.title: Theme Selection
themeSelection.description: Choose your preferred color theme for the application.

ageConfiguration.title: Age Configuration
ageConfiguration.description: Set your age to customize the interface complexity.

robotManagement.title: Robot Management
robotManagement.description: Manage your robot connections and add new robots.

robotMode.title: Robot Mode
robotMode.description: Choose the operating mode for your robot.

clearCache.title: Clear Cache
clearCache.description: Clear all stored data including your workspace, console history, and preferences. This action cannot be undone.

dialog.title: Clear All Data?
dialog.description: This will permanently delete all your workspace data, console history, and preferences. The application will restart after clearing. This action cannot be undone.

descriptions.set_led_color: Set LED to a specific color
descriptions.set_led_rgb: Set LED with custom RGB values
descriptions.while_loop: Repeat blocks while condition is true
descriptions.repeat: Repeat blocks a specific number of times

alerts.noRobotConnected: No robot connected. Please connect a robot first.
alerts.noBlocksInScript: No blocks in script. Please add some blocks first.

pythonViewer.title: Generated Python Code
pythonViewer.emptyState: No blocks in script yet. Add some blocks to see the generated Python code.
pythonViewer.basedOnComment: Based on visual blocks in the script area

welcome.title: Welcome to Visual Programming!
welcome.content: This guide will show you how to create programs by connecting visual blocks. Let's explore the interface together!

blocksPanel.title: Blocks Panel
blocksPanel.content: This is your blocks toolbox. Here you'll find all the commands you can use to program your robot. Blocks are organized by category.

blockCategories.title: Block Categories
blockCategories.content: Blocks are grouped by function: Movement (green), Sound (orange), LEDs (blue), and Sensors (purple). Click on a category to see available blocks.

dragDrop.title: Adding Blocks
dragDrop.content: You can add blocks to your program by dragging them to the canvas, or simply clicking on them. Try clicking this block!

scriptCanvas.title: Script Canvas
scriptCanvas.content: This is where you build your program. Blocks automatically connect in sequence. You can reconnect them by dragging the connection lines.

autoConnections.title: Smart Connections
autoConnections.content: New blocks automatically connect to existing ones to create a sequence. The connections determine the execution order of your program!

executionControls.title: Execution Controls
executionControls.content: Use these buttons to control your program: run/pause, stop, clear all blocks, and view the generated code.

playButton.title: Run Your Program
playButton.content: Click this button to execute your program! The robot will follow the sequence of connected blocks. Make sure you have blocks connected first.

clearScript.title: Clear All Blocks
clearScript.content: This button removes all blocks from the canvas, giving you a fresh start for a new program.

pythonCode.title: View Generated Code
pythonCode.content: See the Python code that your visual blocks create! This helps you learn programming while building with blocks.

consolePanel.title: Console Panel
consolePanel.content: Click here to show the console, where you'll see program output, error messages, and execution progress.

robotConnection.title: Robot Settings
robotConnection.content: Before running programs, connect to your robot through the settings panel. You'll need to configure the robot's IP address.

complete.title: Ready to Code!
complete.content: You're all set! Start by adding some blocks and connecting them to create your first robot program. Have fun coding!
